Package com.safetynet.safetynetalerts.business

Class FloodBusiness

java.lang.Object
com.safetynet.safetynetalerts.business.FloodBusiness
@Service public class FloodBusiness extends Object
FloodBusiness is the service dealing with households served by the fire station.
Version:

Author:
